trans-unit.source: Add a Section

seg-source.mrk: Add a Section

trans-unit.source: In this example, a Comments Section is added to the Sales Quote layout to print quote comments.

seg-source.mrk: In this example, a Comments Section is added to the Sales Quote layout to print quote comments.

trans-unit.source: In the Document Layout, the new section will be inserted below the Total Section line and use Section Type = Line since it will be printed once between the header and footer. This new section will reference Table No. 44, Sales Comments Line, where the comments on a Sales Quote are stored.

seg-source.mrk: In the Document Layout, the new section will be inserted below the Total Section line and use Section Type = Line since it will be printed once between the header and footer.
This new section will reference Table No.
44, Sales Comments Line, where the comments on a Sales Quote are stored.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: Before starting this example, add some comment text to the existing Sales Quote header.

seg-source.mrk: Before starting this example, add some comment text to the existing Sales Quote header.

trans-unit.source: Add Section to Document Layout

seg-source.mrk: Add Section to Document Layout

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to add a section to a document layout:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to add a section to a document layout:

trans-unit.source: Open the SQ-01, Sales Quote, Document Layout.

seg-source.mrk: Open the SQ-01, Sales Quote, Document Layout.

trans-unit.source: Change the Status to Under Development.

seg-source.mrk: Change the Status to Under Development.

trans-unit.source: Insert a line after the Total Section line.

seg-source.mrk: Insert a line after the Total Section line.

trans-unit.source:
Enter the following:
  1. Section Type = Line
  2. Description = Comments
  3. Table No. = 44

seg-source.mrk: Enter the following:<ol start="1">
• Section Type = Line
• Description = Comments
• Table No.

trans-unit.source: : New section added to the Document Layout

seg-source.mrk: : New section added to the Document Layout

trans-unit.source: Add Filters to Section

seg-source.mrk: Add Filters to Section

trans-unit.source: Filters must be set up for the new section to define the table relation, which is done through the Document Layout Filters.

seg-source.mrk: Filters must be set up for the new section to define the table relation, which is done through the Document Layout Filters.

trans-unit.source: In the Document Layout Filters, specify that the Document Type and Document Lines No. filters should always be 0 (the Document Type is an option field where Quote is the first option, therefore this field is 0. “Quote” can also be entered as a filter but then it will not be possible to run the report in languages other than English) and the No. field should be filtered according to the No. field in the Sales Header table (which is the sales quote number).

seg-source.mrk: In the Document Layout Filters, specify that the Document Type and Document Lines No.
filters should always be 0 (the Document Type is an option field where Quote is the first option, therefore this field is 0.
“Quote” can also be entered as a filter but then it will not be possible to run the report in languages other than English) and the No.
field should be filtered according to the No.
field in the Sales Header table (which is the sales quote number).

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to add filters to the section:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to add filters to the section:

trans-unit.source: With the section line for “Comments” selected, click Line > Filters on the Sections FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: With the section line for “Comments” selected, click Line > Filters on the Sections FastTab.

trans-unit.source:
On the first line, enter the following:
  1. Field No. = 1
  2. Filter Type = Text

seg-source.mrk: On the first line, enter the following:<ol start="1">
• Field No.
• Filter Type = Text

trans-unit.source:
On the second line, enter the following:
  1. Field No. = 2
  2. Filter Type = Value
  3. Filter Field No. = 3

seg-source.mrk: On the second line, enter the following: <ol start="1">
• Field No.
• Filter Type = Value
• Filter Field No.

trans-unit.source:
On the third line, enter the following:
  1. Field No. = 7
  2. Filter Type = Text

seg-source.mrk: On the third line, enter the following:<ol start="1">
• Field No.
• Filter Type = Text

trans-unit.source: : Filters added to the new section

seg-source.mrk: : Filters added to the new section

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Document Layout Filters page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Document Layout Filters page.

trans-unit.source: Specify Field

seg-source.mrk: Specify Field

trans-unit.source: The last step is to specify the field to be printed for the Comments Section. This is done through the Document Layout Fields as described earlier. Field No. 6 from table 44 (no filters are required since it is from the same table as specified in the Section) will be printed in Italics.

seg-source.mrk: The last step is to specify the field to be printed for the Comments Section.
This is done through the Document Layout Fields as described earlier.
Field No.
6 from table 44 (no filters are required since it is from the same table as specified in the Section) will be printed in Italics.

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to specify the field to be printed in the Comments section:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to specify the field to be printed in the Comments section:

trans-unit.source: With the section line for “Comments” selected, click Line > Fields on the Sections FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: With the section line for “Comments” selected, click Line > Fields on the Sections FastTab.

trans-unit.source:
On the first line, enter the following:
  1. Line = 1
  2. Description = Comment
  3. Type = Value
  4. Table No. = 44
  5. Field No. = 6
  6. Font Style = Italic

seg-source.mrk: On the first line, enter the following:<ol start="1">
• Line = 1
• Description = Comment
• Type = Value
• Table No.
• Field No.
• Font Style = Italic

trans-unit.source: : Field added to the new section

seg-source.mrk: : Field added to the new section

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Run Report to view the report changes.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Run Report to view the report changes.

trans-unit.source: Select the Show Request Page check box and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Show Request Page check box and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: In the request page, click Preview.

seg-source.mrk: In the request page, click Preview.

trans-unit.source: : Comment text from the Sales Quote header added to the report

seg-source.mrk: : Comment text from the Sales Quote header added to the report

trans-unit.source: Close the Print Preview page.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Print Preview page.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Document Layout Fields page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Document Layout Fields page.

trans-unit.source: Change the Status to Certified to make it available to the users.

seg-source.mrk: Change the Status to Certified to make it available to the users.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Document Layout page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Document Layout page.
